messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fw: children's chat sites
messages.msgSnippet: Brooke, I have two wonderful nieces that live in Va.  One is 15, one is 12. They are very kind, sweet girls.  The older niece plays vilolin with the local
messages.messageBody:
Brooke, I have two wonderful nieces that live in Va. One is 15, one is 12.
They are very kind, sweet girls. The older niece plays vilolin with the
local symphony orchestra, and the younger niece is horse crazy-- she rides at
local stables each week, and has taken lessons for about 3 yrs. I bet they
would LOVE to meet your daughter through email and also on the instant
message! Please email me privately if your daughter would be interested in
meeting them, and we will take it from there! My address is HPaulson5@...
Karen in Ind

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fw: children's chat sites
messages.msgSnippet: Sonia, Thanks so much for the reply but with a younger brother permanently in the dogbox I think she would prefer a girl to write to! LOL But thanks again
messages.messageBody:
Sonia,
Thanks so much for the reply but with a younger brother permanently in "the
dogbox" I think she would prefer a girl to write to! LOL But thanks again
Namaste
Brooke
